mapper.select: SELECT SNUM AS snum ,BID AS bid ,SINTRO AS sintro ,SNAME AS sname ,SADDRESS AS saddress ,SDETAILADDR AS sdetailaddr ,SPHONE AS sphone ,STIME AS stime ,SPARKING AS sparking ,SIMAGE AS simage ,STYPE AS stype ,SHOLIDAY AS sholiday ,SDATE AS sdate ,SRATELV0 AS sratelv0 ,SRATELV1 AS sratelv1 ,SRATELV2 AS sratelv2 ,SRATELV3 AS sratelv3 ,SLIMIT AS slimit FROM STORES WHERE BID = #{bid} ORDER BY SDATE DESC
SELECT * FROM MEMBERS WHERE MID LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR MPHONE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
SELECT * FROM GRADES WHERE SNUM=#{snum} AND GCURRENT = 'yes'

SELECT * FROM STORE WHERE GNUM IN
#{gnum}
